replies.body: now this is a Teemo skin

Madhatter Teeto

lol i was about to type this when i read it
Annie in Wonderland has a friend now
this is so good! I think it would be a cool skin theme for lulu too!
He already has enough skins as it is.

> [{quoted}](name=Nadalius,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=iQjGPfjN,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-08-15T19:30:04.760+0000)

Kog'Maw has 10.
This is a great skin concept and I really think a champion like teemo who has a lack of skins could really use this in his repertoire.
#KILL IT WITH FIRE

OH MY GOSH IT'S SO BEAUTIFUL! 

T-T

I say if Teemo is the Mad Hatter, his mushrooms should be tea cups.

It would make more sense for him to be the Cheshire Cat tho. It can turn invisible and move fast. Mushrooms could be the Hat as well since the Cheshire Cat likes it so much.

This would be a cute addition to Annie in Wonderland.

I don't think it reminds many people of a circus.
i like it
More of Alice in Wonderland themed, but fuq yea it's cool.

If this was an acctuall temmo skin i would probs main him....
sorry everyone else
Welp...don't think ill be able to sleep for the next 10 nights. Seriously, this the the stuff nightmares are made of.

We do need more clowns. {{champion:35}} {{champion:222}}  :o) so it'll be possible to make an all clown team.

Perhaps have a hidden passive called "Send in the Clowns" or "Attack of the Killer Clowns".

I'm going to be optimistic about this.

Circus {{champion:62}}.
circus shaco while ur at it

This is actually very adorable and really gives a colourful look to Teemo in comparison to his other skins! I definitely would buy this on Day 1 if it was to be real! Fits well with the Wonderland theme indeed. xD
would buy
A Teemo skin I'd actually buy, and I haven't played him in months.
How about a Circus Kennen skin?
WHY DO I LOVE THIS SO MUCH..  Teemo you just got a skin, go away. {{champion:17}}
Teemo can go to wonderland with Annie!
{{champion:17}} teemo skin !
Rito pls! {{champion:17}} {{summoner:30}}
now teemo has a skin to represent his fanbase, horay.
